1.content:
Jaune was walking down one of the numerous hallways of Beacon, brooding over his life choices. Since six months to the day, he's worked his butt off to prove he belonged in Beacon. He's trained heavily with his partner Pyrrha everyday, he's studied as hard as he could, and even saved his former tormentor Cardin from an Ursa!

But he's recently hit a wall. The past week, he's averaged C's and B's in Grimm Studies and Dust Mixing. He even won a match against one of the lower tier members of teams in Combat Class. But he's still called a dunce, dealing with the whispers of dragging his prodigal partner Pyrrha and other teammates Ren and Nora down with him. Even if Cardin stopped bullying him, the others jeer at him for being weak. Saying he'll never amount to anything more than a warm body on the field, a mediocre hunter at best.

Jaune slammed a fist into a hard wall in frustration ... only to shake his hand as the pain reached his brain.

"OW! OW! OW! Man that hurts..." he said while cradling his bruised wrist, his Aura slow to heal it due to Combat Class having eaten away most of it earlier in the day. "I wish there was a way for me to get stronger faster. I don't care what it takes, but I need to be the leader my team needs me to be!"

Feeling his resolve tighten, Jaune went to the ______ to look for ways to get stronger.
1.title: Just another day

12.content:
Jaune needed some time alone. Some time to think to himself, away from everyone else. He wasn't the best student, but he knew that the library had a lot of information and covered a wide variety of subjects. Maybe some reading away from everyone else could help him figure out what he could do in the future.

It wasn't long before he finally arrived at the library. As he found an empty space by himself he noticeed something on the table and saw that it was_____.
12.title: Library (Weiss and Blake)

choices: Himself in a body of Weiss
122.content:
He saw Weiss’s necklace and decided to get it for her only to feel a shock rush through him.

He shrank down to her height, his clothes became hers and his facial features also became hers.

He had become....
122.title: Weiss's necklace

13.content:
The training room immediately came to his mind. He needed to get better.

He might have been able to handle the lower tier members of their class, but when it came to people like Ruby, Yang, Ren, Nora, or Pyrrha he was going to loose singlehandedly. He wasn't even a proper warm-up for them.

He knew that there were times where he needed to correct himself on his stance and how he handled his shield and sword, especially during a fight. The more he practiced the easier it would be for his body to it naturally.

He entered the training room and saw a few students already there training as well. He went to the nearest open section. The moment he entered the room he set the difficulty. It started off simple with him being able to easily best his enemies, but as his training progressed the 'enemies' got harder and harder for him to deal with. Soon it got to the point where his enemies were able to best him without much trouble.

"That's enough," Jaune sighed to the room. The robots in the room stopped. Jaune sighed as he tiredly left the room.

As he was leaving the training room he saw a necklace with a familiar symbol down on the ground. He kneeled down to pick it up and realized that he knew whose necklace it was.

It was____
13.title: Training Room (Pyrrha and Yang)

131.content:
It was Pyrrha's.

He had seen her wear it a few times in between classes and when she was in her pajamas at night. He took a minute to admire the craftsmanship of her necklace. The necklace was a golden chain attached to a gold and red symbol that looked like Pyrrha's weapons when it was strapped to her back.

He placed it in his pocket and continued on his way. He would give Pyrrha her necklace back next time he saw her. She was probably worried about where it was.

(How fast are the changes?)
131.title: Pyrrha's

1312.content:
As he walked his hair turned red and went down to his back as his body gain curves and became just like Pyrrha.

https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/p__/...

What does he become?
1312.title: Fast

13122.content:
“Ray!” Ray turned to see her sister Pyrrha run over to her. “I’ve been looking for you. We have been called to a mission.” Pyrrha said excited.

“Really I Can’t Wait to go!” The twins went to prepare as they got on. Team RNPR met up with another huntress.
13122.title: Becomes her twin

132.content:
The chain of the necklace was a bright gold and they symbol attached to resembled a heart set on fire.

He knew who this belonged to.

It belonged to, Yang he had seen her wear a few times when she was in her casual attire. He couldn't help but stare at it when it rested on her chest. Not that he was staring or anything! He just happened to notice it!

Yang was probably wondering where it was. He should give it to her next time he saw. He placed it in his pocket.
If he kept it out a moment longer he would have seen that it had a dull shine.

(Does he turn into a copy of her or a type of sibling?)
132.title: Yang's

1322.content:
When he placed it in his pocket his body and mind becomes that of Yang but as her twin sister.

https://orig00.deviantart.net/e4d0/f/201...

Rang about the necklace and went to bring it to Yang.

She went outside the room and went to search for her sister. She started by searching....
1322.title: A Twin Sister

choices: Starts to age up to Goodwitchs age
13222.content:
Rang checked the Classroom but saw a class was in there with Goodwitch. She tried to sneak away but...

“Mrs. Xiao Long you will come up front and tell the class why you came in here.” Goodwitch said. So Rang went up as she tried explaining why she came in there.
13222.title: The classroom

132221.content:
As she explain her height grew two inches as her bust grew to H cups as it began to spill out of her top and her ass squeezed her shorts.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/8b/1d/9c/...

“I came in search of my little sister of course, sorry that I may have intrude into your lesson.” Rang said as she finished and left the class. Her next place to look was...
132221.title: Starts to age up to Goodwitchs age

151.content:
The classroom. The classroom might not have anything to help him get strong immediately, but he bet that he would find a teacher there. It wouldn't be long before his next class.

He had gotten better about asking for help ever since Forever Fall. Before that he felt like he had to do everything on his own to live to his family's legacy. He might have been training with his friends to get stronger, but he could still go to a teacher as well. If he was going to be the leader that his friends deserved then he would set aside his pride to grow stronger for them.

He entered the classroom and looked around. There weren't any students in the many desks around the classroom, and the teacher didn't seem to be there right now, but they might be in the backroom.

"Um hello is anyone here?" Jaune called out, hoping that someone would answer.

(Who does he turn into?)
151.title: Classroom (Glynda Female Version of Himself)

choices: He takes the place of the real winter
153.content:
He walks to the entrance where he saw a rapier in a stone. He grabbed it and pulled it out. “What a nice blade.” Then his hair turned white and his figure became that of Winter Schnee.

https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/vsba...
153.title: Entrance (Winter)

info.brief_description: Jaune gets turned into the girls from RWBY.
info.description: Jaune from RWBY wants to become one of the greatest heroes of Remnant. He'll do whatever it takes, but what happens if it means losing himself in the process. In this interactive story, Jaune ends up triggering a transformation that will turn him into one of the lovely ladies of the RWBY universe. Anything goes, just use proper grammar, and try to keep things simple.
